author: rickhall
msg: Modified the POM so that the manifest imports AND exports the packages
exported by the framework, otherwise you will always get constraint
violations if you try to use this bundle.

author: kevan
msg: GERONIMO-2537 Minor license header updates. Most not really necessary, but makes it easier to scan for problems

author: abrown
msg: 1. Create a new JUnit utility file, junit/JAXPFinder.java, that is only
instantiated when all required XML classes are in the classpath.
2. Move the import of DocumentBuilderFactory out of junit/XML.java and into
junit/JAXPFinder.java. This extra level of indirection combined with the
conditional instantiation of JAXPFinder ensures that we do not attempt to
instantiate a DocumentBuilderFactory unless we have the necessary JAXP

author: kevan
msg: GERONIMO-2537 Minor license header updates. Most not really necessary, but makes it easier to scan for problems
